name: Frozen Soil
description:
Frozen Soil is a Madmax style turn based JRPG set in post apocalyptic ice age earth. Befriend giant alien girls and fight giant enemies with your trusty vehicle!

----Gameplay----

Most of the combat skills in this game require the consumption of certain items, such as ammunition and repair kits.

If the required item is missing, the skill cannot be used.

Many skills are tied to equipment, and different equipment has different skills

----A wide variety of recruits----

The player can recruit giant aliens, a vengeful girl who drives bulldozers, a shrine maiden on a bike who can summon supernatural beings, and much more. 

****Estimated game time is about 1-2 hours****

****The game may contain strong language and mild fanservice(non-nudity)****

****English is not my first language, I apologize for any grammar mistakes****
